dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Shows major cities, political divisions including Russian America, Danish America, British America, and Central America. "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1860 by S. Augustus Mitchell, Jr. in the Clerks Office of the District Court of the U.S. for the Eastern District of Pennsylvania". Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington. From: Mitchell's New General Atlas, Containing Maps Of The Various Countries Of The World, Plans Of Cities, Etc. In right upper margin: 3. 1 map: col.; 31 x 26 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_title_s: Map of North America showing its political divisions and recent discoveries in the polar regions; constructed and engraved by W. Williams, Philadelphia.
dc_creator_sm: Williams, W. (Wellington),Mitchell, S. Augustus, Jr. (Samuel Augustus),Dahl, James, former owner.
